org.robolectric.shadows
Class ShadowResources

java.lang.Object
  org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowResources

@Implements(value=android.content.res.Resources.class)
public class ShadowResources
extends Object

Shadow of Resources that simulates the loading of resources

See Also:
RobolectricTestRunner.RobolectricTestRunner(Class)
